summary: A documentary about the undersea explorers and how they penetrate into the underwater world.
cast: Frédéric Dumas|Albert Falco|Jacques-Yves Cousteau|François Saout|André Bourne-Chastel|Marcel Colomb|Simone Cousteau|Jean Delmas|Jacques Ertaud|Norbert Goldblech|Fernand Hanae|André Laban|Maurice Leandri|Paul Martin|Denis Martin-Laval|Henri Ple|Etienne Puig|Albert Raud|Emile Robert|René Robino|Jean-Louis Teicher|James Dugan
title: El mundo del silencio
